roleset.name: exit again
roleset.note: REEMERGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reemerge' based on morphing 'emerge' as 're-emerge'. (from reemerge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: exit, emerge
example.text: PS of New Hampshire will re-emerge from bankruptcy proceedings.

roleset.name: come to be seen as (again)
roleset.note: REEMERGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reemerge' based on morphing 'emerge' as 're-emerge'. (from reemerge.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: blessed are the peacemakers
example.text: More importantly, he re-emerged as a peacemaker last summer after the Central Park rape of a white jogger.
example.arg: after the Central Park rape of a white jogger.
